website_summaries.verdict: Thousands of positive reviews and a best-selling rank equal peace of mind when it comes to keeping an eye on baby – even after dark.
pros: Viewing angles are customizable (including wide angle and zoom) with interchangeable lenses
Images are clear and in real time
Battery lasts up to 8 hours, or 12 hours in power-saving mode
If volume is turned down, baby’s crying will activate LED lights as an alert
cons: Some users feel the price point is too high
Other electronics may interfere and cause the signal to drop

website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best. Its state-of-the-art interchangeable lens and convenient features can't be topped by competitors.
pros: Lenses are normal, zoom, and wide
cons: After months of use, you might have to replace the battery

website_summaries.verdict: The features are worth the price, including video streaming and a long range.
pros: Versatile, reliable, low-latency video monitoring with night vision, temp display, LED sound display, talk-back, and a unique interchangeable lens system

website_summaries.verdict: This premium, portable baby monitor enables you to customize your viewing angle and zoom.
pros: Offers a compact monitor that features a worry-free retractable antenna
Provides remote pan, tilt, and digital zoom for unmatched maneuverability
Comes with an audio-on, screen-off mode that you can use to help preserve the monitor's battery life
cons: Pricey in comparison to similar monitors
Emits a signal that tends to be weak and inconsistent

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and sound! Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this monitor! Going on over two years, by far the best baby purchase! I had a previous monitor, different company, more expensive and so much less in comparison! I have recommended this monitor to siblings and friends who have all sinced purchased! We bought the add on camera as well. Easy to pair and use! The best part is the customer service team who is always there to assist if ever there are any issues! Hands down worth the money! Great sound and picture quality! I’m lost with out my monitor. Peace of mind at it’s finest!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The internet didn’t lie, this is a great monitor combo
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is awesome. The refresh rate is just shy of real time and the picture is very good. The camera automatically switches from day light mode to infrared, depending on the available light. It may still change modes when playing with the camera as it notices a change in lighting. The two way communication is fun to prank my wife also. The speaker quality is pretty dang good coming out of the camera and also playing back through our monitor. So far we are happy and hopeful that this product doesn’t glitch or fail like other customers.
customer_reviews.author: The Lorax

customer_reviews.title: Old faithful
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a project nursery monitor and while it seemed great out of the box, I couldn’t get the WiFi feature to work and it just seemed so complicated to set up. I decided we were much better off with a simple monitor like the Infant Optics. We used one with our older child and occasionally had battery issues, but it looks like this is a newer model and they provided some tips to strengthen the battery life. Plugged it in and instantly worked. Good quality and reliable monitor all around.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can see my baby during her naps! I don't have to continually go upstairs to check on her. I love the panning feature so that when my baby girl Wiggles and moves around I can move the camera to keep her fully in view. I also love that I can turn the volume off but still see the sound indicator lights on the side. It also gives a very good clear picture both during the day and at night. I can actually see my baby's chest move up and down reassuring me that she's still breathing. Perfect for company! Love love love this baby monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Allard

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about this except that it won’t hold a charge! It will be on the charger all day and the second we take it off it’s flashing red and dying. We missed the window to return it so now we have to keep it plugged in which defeats the whole purpose of having a battery powered monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have our daughter take naps/sleep in her bassinet during the day in our living room and sleep with us at night in our bedroom. However some nights my wife and I want to stay up late or have family/guests over, instead of having our baby around the noise and being up late this monitor has been very helpful at getting her to sleep early without worrying while she’s in our room away from us. Quality of the image and sound is top of the line! So we feel confident to use it once she’ll be sleeping in her room :) Love it! Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephane

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June of 2017 and spent 178 since it got such great reviews. By January it won't hold a charge and only works if plugged in. Even with that it has to be positioned just right to even charge. Extremely frustrated. I wish I had bought the warranty....or another monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Anna L Boulware

customer_reviews.title: Night vision
customer_reviews.text: Loved for 7 months that it worked. The night vision stopped working. Very disappointing for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Best baby monitor!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 different monitors Nest, Arlo and this one to see which one would work best as a baby monitor. This DXR-8 video monitor was hands down our favorite! The video quality and night vision camera is clear, audio picks up every little sound and having a portable screen that we can put down anywhere without having to log into our phone made it the most convenient. Their customer service was also super helpful and fast in responding to questions/concerns which made being a customer easy. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: The monitor battery died completely after just a few months of use. Now it only works when plugged in to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl K.

customer_reviews.title: Monitor died after 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: Monitor died after 1 month. The on off button stopped working and had lines through the picture. But when working properly it was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of the great reviews
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as my very first baby monitor based off the great reviews! First things first, it has a super easy, straightforward setup, done in under 2 minutes. The extension cable is fairly long if you don't have a plug point nearby. Tonnes of crib mounting options on Amazon! Picture quality is decent. Since it's a new purchase for me, so far the battery life seems to be decent. Night vision is pretty good too. But my favorite feature is the temperature sensor, I can never quite be sure of the right temperature in the nursery and how to appropriately dress the baby, so this is such a bonus! Hope thos review helps. Will update with further usage.
customer_reviews.author: isha

customer_reviews.title: Smelly Used Monitor :(
customer_reviews.text: This review is not of the product performance, just of what we were given. We ordered a brand new product and received a previously opened package. All of the components were undone and smelled of someone’s cat. My husband’s allergies immediately went off from the cat smell. I’m highly disappointed we were given someone’s return. We are returning this monitor and will be purchasing this same product at Target instead.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Ruined
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about it. But it stopped working and I can’t fix it because I’m in Egypt and no one can fix it here. This is the most expensive monitor and I got it because it supposed to be a good quality. Its less than a year and its ruined.
customer_reviews.author: rana hesham

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: The monitor button failed after only having it 6 months. Are you kidding me?
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: So SIMPLE!
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to simplicity this is the only option! It mounts easily to the wall using one screw and can be taken up and down or just placed on a side table. You can see from the photos the clarity is great. In the picture, we are not using the zoom feature, the zoom lens gives a nice close up of the crib and you can see the distance away in the picture, about 8 feet. LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea LaVeigne

customer_reviews.title: Sound fail
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for less than a year and the sound has failed. Very disappointing for such an expensive unit
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Bridglal

customer_reviews.title: Powering on System Activating!
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times in the months I have owned this item. The monitor is now stuck at powering on system activating.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle O

customer_reviews.title: Broken in box
customer_reviews.text: The monitor was broken in the Box when I received it
customer_reviews.author: B szostak

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Baby Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Picture and sound is very clear! Even at night. Menu and screen is easy to use. I love that the camera can be aimed up and down from the monitor. The batter lasts all day for us and the signal through 4 walls is always great. Wouldn't ask for anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Elisheva Wiggleton

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product....
customer_reviews.text: We are very disappointed with this baby monitor. We paid $170 for this “best seller,” and it won’t even give us a consistent signal. We live in a SINGLE floor, 1300 square foot condo, and our monitor is not more than 100 feet from the camera. It beeps in and out of signal every few seconds/minutes. We’ve tried everything... if we lived in a multi level condo, or a larger home, I would understand, but this monitor should work considering our situation. If you’re looking for a baby monitor, make sure you do your research and don’t count on the number of stars or “best seller” claimed status.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Watts

customer_reviews.title: Faulty battery!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this at the end of February and loved being able to monitor the baby - you could hear him well and see him him well. The charge on the battery was not very long and thought perhaps this is a standard? It is the May 1st and the battery is completely dead. Hardly holds a charge at all now. Last night I unplugged it for 5 min and the battery died!!! How can I replace this item or refund?
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Churavy

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor and customer support
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal customer of this unit for the last 2.5 years. The quality and ease of use of this monitor has been great! Even better is customer service support. I had an issue with the sound after my warranty had expired and they replaced the unit free of charge. It was quick, easy and I received my replacement within 2 days. It makes a big difference knowing the company stands behind their product and that they care about the satisfaction of their customer.
customer_reviews.author: Layloo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We previously had a Samsung video monitor that recently broke, and we purchased the Infant Optics DXR-8 to replace it. We like this monitor so much better! Wonderful range, image quality, and battery life. The menu is very easy to navigate, and the features are easy to adjust/set. I appreciate being able to change the volume level of the audio "beep" when the unit is low on battery or out of range. I LOVE that it shows me the temperature of my child's room (before having a baby I never realized I'd be so concerned about the temperature differences from room-to-room in our house!) All I need now is a second camera for when baby #2 arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is GREaT!
customer_reviews.text: Night vision is great. My daughter has a crib tent because she climbs out. I have the camera placed in the camera window on the tent. It still has great picture quality even through the plastic window. I have only used it a few nights but so far so good. I can’t wait to see if the range will reach onto my back yard patio. It’s been raining so I haven’t checked yet. The set up was real easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Salvacion

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this productfor about 2.5 years. It is great to have the camera and the extra features (ability to talk to child over monitor, night vision, etc). I have had a couple of issues with our monitor, but the company has been great to work with to remedy the issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and phenomenal customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! We use the duel camera option since my girls are in different rooms and it’s awesome! It scans between both rooms flawlessly. We did experience a problem with a camera picking up sound but not video. I contacted customer service and they were quick, responsive, EXTREMELY accommodating, and professional. They were more on top of my issue than I was, sending me emails informing me of the status of my issue and following up with customer service after I received my replacement camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clear picture & sound!
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been great. We had another video monitor that was the same price point and had the tilt/pan option but this unit has much clearer picture & sound. We had to replace our Motorola and the customer service through them wasn’t great so I wanted a different brand. After researching I went with Infant Optics and so far I’m very glad that I did! I will definitely update after more use but it has been leaps and bounds better than our other monitor.
customer_reviews.author: R.G.

customer_reviews.title: Works better than our previous WiFi unit
customer_reviews.text: We previously purchased a Wi-Fi baby monitor unit. We continually had issues with the app crashing in the middle of the night or the app crashing and turning off our phones. After several attempts and nights of not hearing my baby cry, I gave up and decided to try this system. This system has worked great for us so far, the only thing that I wish is that we could have more than one screen on the system. I wish my husband and I can both have a monitor, but only having one will be fine. We like that we have something that’s reliable and dependable and we will hear our baby in the middle of the night. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Much better quality and consistency than the NestCam
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Infant Optics DXR-8 to replace our NestCam, which we had been using in baby's room for the past 9 months. The Infant Optics is so much better than the NestCam - the picture quality is the same if not better, the monitor tells us the temperature in baby's room (a comfy 73 degrees right now for nap), and the monitor will always show the picture (rather than the Nest - the Nest service over the past couple of months has been awful). We're thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Baral

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best baby monitor. My husband works in IT for a living and did a lot of research while pregnant with my first. He ended up choosing this one and we have been so happy. My daughter, now over a year old, is always heard and seen while in her crib. I had one issue with the camera shutting off and it was just the battery not plugged in all the way! Easy fix. Now expecting baby number 2, we will be heading the same camera! I don’t think anyone should even bother with any other kind of camera! This one is the best one out there.
customer_reviews.author: K. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great features, terrible battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, great sound quality, and multiple lenses you can use. Big downfall is battery life is terrible. We have the display charging all day, then as soon as we take it off the charger the battery life immediately goes to 1 bar then beeps at us that it’s dead. It didn’t initially do this, but this past week we can’t take it off the charger. And we’ve only been using it for about 1 month. A lot of money spent on something that can’t hold a charge. I’ll post a video of the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: No Sensitivity Setting
customer_reviews.text: The audio and video are fine, the range is fine, but there is one very important feature missing. There's not a sensitivity setting for turning the receiver on, so you will hear every sound from baby's room. Should have looked for that more carefully, I suppose, but wanted to call it out here so others don't make the same mistake we did. If you plan on using white noise or want to be able to sleep through baby changing sleeping positions, then you should pick a different monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby monitor. I’ve had it almost two years and have had no problems with it. It lets me have peace of mind knowing that my boys are safe in their room. I’m able to see and hear them on the monitor clearly and even talk to them if I need too.
customer_reviews.author: sara west

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I hate this monitor. No matter what I do, it frequently loses signal. It's currently 11pm and I want desperately to get some sleep, but the darn thing isn't working and I can't see the baby. We have turned off every wireless device in the house and no luck. It's an unreliable piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor in this price range hands down.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I had a Motorola previously, and when it died, I went searching for another camera. This one had the best reviews, and it's for a reason. I love that the camera swivels. I love that I can talk to my daughter through the monitor. Has a very good picture, even at night. And I love that it also records the temperature. I think my favorite part though is the range of the monitor. I can go much further with this monitor then I could have my previous one which gives me a much wider range of movement while my little one is sleeping. This is a great monitor and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different monitor!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this monitor no stars I would. We have had to replace the screen part under warranty three times due to the battery not charging. One the battery exploded and broke the back of the monitor off. Now the newest one we purchased will not hold a charge and of course it is out of warranty. We now have to leave it plugged in to actually use it. When new it works great but due to all the problems we have had would not advise anyone to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Razey

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mama!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received our camera today. I can't even explain how AMAZING this camera is. After 3 different (cheaper) camera purchases, I bit the bullet and spent a little more on this one. Let me tell you, I have FINALLY found one that I love! It's so user friendly and it has the easiest setup! Worth every penny I promise! Love love love! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Cam

customer_reviews.title: High Levels of Radiation Exposure
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this monitor because we wanted to try to avoid our system being hacked. It honestly is a great camera system that helped us in the beginning. Unfortunately, we recently found out how much radiation is emitted from a baby monitor and specifically this one. It’s too late for us to get a refund but we jut switched to the D-Link camera system that can be hardwired thus reducing the amount of radio frequency we are exposing our baby to. Wish we had done our research thoroughly before exposing our baby to this monitor for his first 5 months of life!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Those Good Reviews are FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Poor picture quality (the monitor I had 9 years ago for first baby was better), poor sound quality (sound comes in and out which is very grating in the nerves), poor range of motion, and worst of all it constantly drops the signal saying “out of range” when we’re only one very thin wall away. Literally like 15 feet. I have an old cheap spare monitor and it is more reliable with a clearer picture! Either all the good reviews are paid or the buyers are delusional and just trying to justify the fact that they threw away money on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: IgorK

customer_reviews.title: Bribing for good reviews - Average Product
customer_reviews.text: No wonder this product has so many good reviews. They offer you a second camera in exchange for a good review. And won't sent it to you until you send them a link to your review and offer you a "chance to make it right". This monitor is average, doesn't last a full 12 hours unless plugged in, and really isn't better than most on the market. I am annoyed I got sucked in by the reviews. Sure, it has some good features but the dishonesty of the company to basically buy reviews and lack of integrity makes me remove one more star.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethS

customer_reviews.title: Love the zoom lens
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with this baby monitor! I bought it to replace my old monitor (of another brand) that died this week. The picture on the infant optics monitor is far superior to my old monitor. I am using the zoom lens since I keep the camera on the opposite side of the room from the crib. I am able to see my baby very clearly, much better than I could using the digital zoom on my old camera. The monitor is simple to operate and I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marymac

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long
customer_reviews.text: This is affordable and easy to use. But, they last about one year before the battery completely dies. I upgraded to this model (from the less expensive version, which broke after about 2 years) for second baby thinking it was the cheaper model's issue. This one didn't even last as long. Now I'm in a continuous cycle of buying replacement batteries that work a short time, if at all. Update: similar to the less expensive version, this has died after 2 years. For the price, I really don't expect the short lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: mariabelle01

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the monitor on Feb 6th because of the reviews. I had my baby on the 20th I had stared using the monitor a few times it would say "out of signal coverage" didn't think anything of it bc I would unplug it and wait five minutes and it would work just fine. But it started to happen more and more. And I'm only two doors down from the nursery it shouldn't have signal issues. Now it happens every few minutes and sadly I can't exchange it because 30 days is up and I sure don't have another 160.00 to purchase another. I wouldn't recommend this product very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JennifferB

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised Very good night vision Panning is awesome Great range and battery life (so far) Really happy with it. My only compliant is the mounting is pretty limited with only 1 screw. I'm not going to put a screw into my crib... or trust one screw to hold this over my son.... So I made an FDM holder that clips to the crib (pics attached)... hopefully the manufacturer could offer a universal version of this clip and/or add another screw hole.
customer_reviews.author: Matt De Remer

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last and the range is poor.
customer_reviews.text: We had this camera for our last child. It lasted about a year and then it broke. It was just okay. Got the job done. We bought a new one after the first one broke. Same thing, lasted about a year. We bought another one for our newest child but due to the location of his room at the far end of our house we don’t get a signal in the most important rooms in the house. We finally gave up/in and bought the Panasonic long range one and I’m glad we did. The signal is available throughout the house and the quality seems much better. I’ll post on the Panasonic product page after we’ve used it a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: ProShopper

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery and range
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok monitor I don’t know why it has such high reviews. Battery isn’t very good. Range is awful. Won’t reach to our kitchen from our child's upstairs bedroom. Nor will it reach to backyard straight line of site from outside the child's window. The price seems unreasonable in this day and age when you can purchase a ring camera far superior to this for $59. This said I’ve yet to use a single video baby monitor that impressed me and we’re on our third child. Like I said this works just not very well and certainly not for the price. This technology needs some serious upgrades from all manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M

customer_reviews.title: Simple and worked well at first. Started to break down after one year and broken at two years.
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed with this baby monitor, which seems to be the top-selling monitor on Amazon. The battery quality really started to degenerate around the one year mark. So we had to buy a replacement. Then the antenna loosened very easily after being knocked off the nightstand by my son. Then broken after a second fall. We'll be buying a different brand for our next one--one that will last longer and be worth investment.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery for this product is abysmal. Our battery started malfunctioning within a few months, so the manufacturer sent a replacement, and two years later, the newer battery has trouble charging and drains quickly. All this is without using the video, only sound. If you want to have the video on, forget about it, the battery won’t last and you’ll have to plug it in, and that’s not practical at all if you need to move around the house doing chores and such. I would not recommend this product because of the poor battery performance.
customer_reviews.author: 10isfan

customer_reviews.title: Cadillac of baby monitors
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! Picks up audio from bathroom which is the next room over its that good! One complaint is sometimes it will just die without actually notifying you the battery is low / running low. This may just be a flaw in ours but I felt Terri or when my husband woke me up with my daughter screaming bloody murder because the monitor just died without notification And I didn't hear her crying :/ otherwise I like the product it does its job beautifully. Photo quality on day or night mode is perfect. It automatically changes from day to night mode by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Monitor failing after 4 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor 4 months ago. Within the last month, the signal quality has been poor. The monitor signal cuts out intermittently even when we're in an adjacent room. Now the battery won't charge. At first, the monitor seemed decent, but to start failing after only a few months is unacceptable. Of course it started right after the return time frame ended as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate but the picture quality...
customer_reviews.text: I just got my baby monitor and the picture quality was not as great as I expected but it works well so far. Easy to operate and simple function. I will update my review in couple months. Update : It has been a year and It still working super fine. I wanted to have a closed circit baby monitor to reduce risk of hacking and this product is great. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie J

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Increasing to 5-stars for great customer service after initially complaining about a terrible battery. I had an issue with the battery. The issue turned out to be caused by charging the monitor with a different charger than the one that came with the monitor, which had a different power setting. We figured this out after using customer service to get a new cord after the cord became loose and would no longer remain plugged. The monitor is overall very good. Range is good, picture is good, controls are all good. I switched to this monitor after my withings wifi monitor got hacked, and this is a much better overall experience.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my old monitor, which had everything I ever wanted. Unfortunately, it is discontinued. Found this one, thought it would be amazing with all of reviews. Price was a bit steep but so was my original monitor. This baby monitor did not last more than 2 days at our house. The battery died in the middle of the day, even though I had the screen off most of the time. There is no VOX capability and the lullabies. Not sure what the price actually brings to the table. Found a new monitor for more than 1/2 the price and that's 150% better. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Too much interference!
customer_reviews.text: The one big complaint about this monitor is the interference from other devices. We have an old Motorola baby monitor for my 2 yr old and I can’t put monitors close together at night because the Motorola monitor interferes with the infant optics monitor. The microwave interferes with it. You can’t stream anything on WiFi while your LO is sleeping because it causes the monitor to cut in and out or it will beep “out of range”. Honestly I’m surprised by the amount of good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The power button on my original one quit clicking after 16 months of use (still worked but would randomly shut off if something hit the button or because of gravity). I contacted Infant Optics who immediately responded to my inquiry and set me up with a full replacement. Within 4 days after mailing off my old unit to them, I received my new monitor in the mail. The customer service rep even hooked me up with a free 2 day shipping request so I would get my new unit straight from Amazon and in a timely manner. I would definitely recommend going with this company. They offer an excellent product and have excellent customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Pretty big feature to go out
customer_reviews.text: For the first year this product was a 5 star. About 3 weeks after my 1 year warranty expired, the sound quit working. I can still talk through the unit and my child can hear it, but any noise coming from my child's room, I can't hear. Pretty big feature to go out. Also, The battery in this unit will no longer hold a charge longer than about 4 hours. It used to last almost 2 full days. I know batteries don't last forever, but they should last 18-24 months.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Earhart

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor - bought it again
customer_reviews.text: This is the second DXR-8 monitor we've purchased. We used the first for 4 years, it held up through a lot of travel, and we found it's range and picture quality to be great. I could take it in the yard and garden while my son napped! While it still works, our son dropped the camera about a year ago and it hasn't been the same since so we decided to get a new one. We did have some battery issues with the first one (battery not holding a charge) but customer service was very helpful and responsive to help us fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware of battery and weak signal
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years. We continue to have extremely bad signal and the monitor looses its image.. It continues to say out of signal. We live in a bi-level home and when we are in the kitchen the signal fails! It’s frustrating since this monitor is more expensive than others and we expect more of it. We’ve also replaced the battery once since it wouldn’t hold it’s charge. Beware everyone, give it a second thought. Just because it’s the more expensive option, it’s not the best monitor we’ve invested in.
customer_reviews.author: Curly.Cristina

customer_reviews.title: It has everything you would need!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what more you could want/expect out of a baby monitor. Assembly was easy, put batteries in the remote & plug in the camera. Mounting the camera on the wall required one screw. The picture quality is good, volume is sufficiently loud, the microphone to talk back to your baby is clear. There is nothing complicated about this set-up and the range seems to be pretty good as well. I have not tried the wide-angle lens or any other accessories that you can buy with this monitor. I'd recommend this product to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Second time is the charm?
customer_reviews.text: I like this monitor. Hesitant to say love because this is my second one. I ordered again because I wanted a second camera anyways for our other child’s room. I had heard they fixed the charging port on the monitor and was otherwise happy with the product. The previous model had a port that was loose, would fall out, and always need to be plugged in/would not hold a charge. Of course I haven’t had the new version as long as my other but the design seems improved. Other than that the picture is clear and I find it easy to use. I really like the temperature gauge.
customer_reviews.author: EDU

customer_reviews.title: Super clear video quality & zero lag time!
customer_reviews.text: So far we love our infant optics baby monitor we bought for our second daughter based on a recommendation from a friend who has this monitor for her son. The picture is crystal clear and there's no delay / lag like we've experienced with our older daughter's baby monitor which uses wifi. Was very easy to set up too. We also love that we can connect additional cameras as our family grows. Would definitely recommend this monitor to others!
customer_reviews.author: mary smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: We originally purchased a Wifi cam to use as a baby monitor (Netgear Arlo). It wasn’t reliable enough to use as a baby monitor, so we purchased this camera. It’s dependable, works quite well, and holds a charge. The video quality isn’t the best, but we don’t need 1080p quality. After 7 months, the audio randomly stopped working. There was a temporary “trick” by either removing and adding the camera, or moving it all around and the sound magically fixed itself. We finally just contacted customer service, and they immediately sent us a new camera as a replacement. I believe it was even New Year’s Day when Cristina emailed me back and forth. Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We tried several monitors before getting this one and I was never satisfied until now! This monitor has all the features I wanted and works great. I love the zoom lense which provides a much clearer picture than zoom features on other cameras. I also love the notification beep you get if the camera is out of range of the parent unit is low on battery - it gives me peace of mind that even at night while I’m sleeping I would know if the monitor wasn’t working correctly. Great night vision and clear picture as well!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and purchase a different baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: After using this baby monitor for a few months, it does not charge properly. After charging it and receiving a full battery signal, once I take it out of the charger, the battery depletes to zero and I'll need to charge it again. Also, the quality of the image is not great and not clear during the nighttime mode. It's hard to see my baby in the crib when she's sleeping at night. This baby monitor is not of great quality as I'll have to restart the camera multiple times to have it work. Look elsewhere for a high quality baby monitor.
customer_reviews.author: chaddy

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how this is the “best rated” monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is fine... but certainly nothing to write home about, or to win “best rated.” It works fine, but: the screen is tiny, mine would beep loudly and lose signal when I was literally one wall away from the camera, when I lightly pressed the power button to dim the screen it would jump to power off then realize that’s not what JT was supposed to be doing, and having to go into menu to change the volume was super annoying. There are definitely better monitors out there.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Horrible range
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has horrible range. I purchased a Motorola and it is so much better. I won’t recommend this one to anyone! I was hoping it would work for my infants room which is upstairs but there was no way I’d use it up there because it cut out every couple minutes for long periods of time. Very annoying. Put it in my toddlers room instead because it’s closer to our room and on the same floor but it is still horrible. Very disappointed in this with all the great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Lien

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this baby monitor. It has a very clear picture and great night vision. It loses range sometimes randomly but will quickly pick back up. The camera stopped working and wouldn’t move left at all and worked intermittently when moving right. I reached out to customer service they got back to me immediately attempted to trouble shoot and replaced my unit when that didn’t work! It was very fast and painless and they shipped my replacement out immediately! Very happy with their customer service!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. Great picture quality, love that I can see my babe in the dark, and I didn’t realize how much I’d use the temperature reading. The battery issue where suddenly the battery seems to drain happened to me too. It seems if you drop or jostle the monitor, the battery loosens its connection inside. All I have to do is open up the battery compartment and push on the connection and the battery holds its charge. Glad I read other reviews and didn’t just replace the battery. Infant Optics customer service has been amazing. Had an issue with the charge port and they sent a replacement with no hassle. Very responsive and helpful. I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There are so many good reviews, I thought this would be a wonderful purchase. It’s just okay and now I’m realizing people have 5 star reviews for free monitor cameras or whatever. The screen quality is not great at night. It constantly loses connection, even if the monitor is right in the next room. It’s nothing great and I’m disappointed in my purchase. I should have bought a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Langley

customer_reviews.title: Infant Optics Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: So I had a little problem with my baby monitor. It’s been close to 20months since I purchased it. It suddenly stopped charging so I would leave it constantly on light charging and hoping the wire follows me around(which is pretty long enough). I came on here to read reviews if anyone is having same issue. I came across someone mentioning the infant optics customer service which I reached out to them. Omg they are super helpful and they respond fast with fast solution. They had it resolved just by asking me to follow simple instructions. I love efficient customer service like that! I am a happy customer and would refer. Thank you, infant optics!
customer_reviews.author: Rendaa

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the peace of mind over an audio only monitor
customer_reviews.text: Impressed so far. This is our first video baby monitor (3rd child and 3rd monitor overall) and I wish I had done vide for the first two babies. The peace of mind is much improved. My positive impressions started right out of the box where the camera and monitor paired automatically with no setup required. I initially thought about using a ring cam since we have other cams but that stops working often enough that I’ll feel better with this dedicated unit. The fact that it paired immediately and didn’t require my home WiFi added to that peace of mind. I’m less concerned about security than I am a stable connection and it’s been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different product
customer_reviews.text: I got this after reading reviews that seemed promising. It worked for a day or two and then started disconnecting and freezing! Definitely was not what I expected at all and I ended up buying a different monitor. I’m really disappointed I wasted my money and by the time it didn’t work I couldn’t return in because I bought it months before I was due and didn’t use it until a month after she was born.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Motorolla MBP36S
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the Motorolla MBP36s This unit is about $30 more expensive than the Motorolla MBP36s and under performs in pretty much every area, returning it after 1 night. - Motion capture for both was choppy (I tried this monitor hoping that it would be better than the Motorolla) - Picture quality on the Motorolla was significantly better - Sound quality on Motorolla was significantly better - Signal on the Motorolla was a bit better... both were good in my house (2,300 sqft)
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind for grandparents
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how we raised our children without this excellent tool. The picture is clear, the sound clear, and it is so easy to set up. We no longer have to open the door and disturb our grandson to be assured that he is sleeping safely or is ready to get up. It has been especially useful for sleep training, as we need to know when he actually falls asleep. He can be rocking quietly in his crib for 30 minutes. We wouldn't know it if it wasn't for the Infant Optics baby monitor. The monitor allows me to get things done during his naps without worrying for his safety or comfort. Great quality, intuitive design and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, great sound, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is your standard great monitor with none of the fancy bells and whistles you'd get with a much more expensive choice. The only thing I compromised on with this monitor was a breathing or movement tracker. But the sound and picture quality of this monitor is great. We haven't used the zoom lense yet so I can't speak to that. I like the fact that it has a wireless hand held control panel so I don't have to have my phone screen on all night. Just plugs in and you can either mount it to the wall or sit it on something so it'll be great for travel also! Overall very satisfied with my purchase. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: This is the best monitor I’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom I had no clue about which baby monitors would suit my needs. I wanted something with great night vision, no WiFi, good picture quality, decent range since my apartment isn’t that big, and sound/talk capabilities. Well, this baby monitor has all those listed above and more. It shows the temperature of the room, it can be paired with other cameras and it comes with digital and optical zoom lens. It is well worth the price point it is listed at. Cheaper baby monitors weren’t cutting it for me because they lacked in one category or another. Go with Infant optics if you want a well rounded camera that delivers on all fronts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor /Top Notch customer service
customer_reviews.text: We loved our infant Optics monitor at first. After a couple of months the picture quality started to degrade. But I contacted customer service and they were fast efficient and friendly and got the defective camera replaced ASAP. It was important to me that I not have any nights where I didn't have monitor coverage on my son, and they were kind enough to accommodate so that I had no extra stress worrying about him without having eyes on him. They make a great product and they stand behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor based on high star rating and the amount of reviews. I am here to tell you this monitor is complete garbage. I have no clue why it’s rated so high. The night vision is terrible. Most nights I have to go in there and shine a light on the camera to get the night vision to reset and work on the monitor. The battery life is terrible. It doesn’t even last the night with the picture and the sound turned off. It has very low range. I really can’t say anything I actually like about it.
customer_reviews.author: hershy86

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a closed circuit camera (not WiFi enabled) and this hit all of our check boxes. Overall we have enjoyed the product, we even purchased a second camera for a new baby on the way. It picks up sound well and has good range for our 1800sq ft house. We have had some interference issues but they are few and far between and resolve by restarting the unit. About a year in we had issues with the first camera in night mode. It was very dark and difficult to see. However after a few emails with the support team, We had a new camera in the mail. So overall this was a painless process.
customer_reviews.author: sambart

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the ability to link multiple cameras. The picture is good, even at night. About 6 months after purchasing, I noticed it wasn’t staying charged. One day, when I pulled the plug out of the parent unit, part of the plug broke off in the monitor. This is their new “pin” hole charger. I contacted the company and they were very quick to help me. They let me know how to expedite the replacement and we’re very responsive to my emails. I didn’t want to go weeks without a monitor, and I say the whole process only took 3-4 days. Cristina was was wonderful. The product is good, but the customer service is even better
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Safe, reliable, & great functionality
customer_reviews.text: I put this camera on my registry for baby #1 because of a great review from a relative. So glad I did! Camera worked flawlessly from day one. After about one year, the monitor battery started dying quickly. After reading a few random reviews with the same issue, I followed their advice of simply unplugging the battery, then plugging it back in. Problem solved instantly! I love this camera so much that I bought a second add-on camera for baby #2. The “Scan” feature is great. 10 seconds of video/audio from each camera, all night long. I recently purchased this as a shower gift, and will continue to recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: FCM

customer_reviews.title: monitors sound stopped working. EXPENSIVE CRAP
customer_reviews.text: Well loved this camera until the sound stopped coming through the monitor. I have the volume all the way up and can barley hear anything. Never got wet or dropped. Not sure if its the camera itself or the monitor. Very frustrating since it's a pretty expensive unit. Emailed the manufacturer about a week ago and received no response. Gnna try to call and see what they can do. I guess just beware these monitors are CRAP!!!!!. replacement monitors are just as expensive as a whole unit. I will be buying a whole different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Feed cuts out
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to move the camera and it has decent picture quality. My issue is the dumb thing constantly cuts out with interference or something. My baby is in the next room over. The camera is about 14’ from the monitor through a wall it shouldn’t have such issues. Most of the time the sound cuts out here and there but sometimes I lose the feed completely and the monitor beeps at 3am. Not the quality I expected from such an expensive monitor.
customer_reviews.author: M Beardain

customer_reviews.title: The best customer service I have ever dealt with online
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product back in 2017. It worked perfectly for two years until one day earlier this year (2019) the speaker on the monitor unit stopped relaying sound from the camera. Knowing that my warranty has expired long ago, I contacted support in hope of buying an internal speaker for the monitor. To my surprise their customer support representative (Hanna) offered me a whole new replacement monitor unit without any expenses even with an expired warranty. This is by far the most outstanding customer service I have ever encountered online and I highly recommend this product due to its quality and amazing after sales service.
customer_reviews.author: Hashim A.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to set up and start using straight out of the box. I love the picture quality and the sound quality. The talk back feature is a great bonus and one of the reasons I chose this versus a cheaper brand. The room temperature detector is really nice and convenient to have. The fact this does not connect to WiFi is very reassuring so I don’t have to worry about hackers watching my baby without me knowing as well as I don’t have to worry about losing connection since my WiFi cuts out constantly. I’m honestly really happy with this purchase and will buy from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great until it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: Imagine waking up to hearing your baby cry only to realize there is someone in your child's room and the cry didn't come from the monitor. That's the fun I had before I realized the monitor was freezing and the only way to fix it is to pull the battery. The camera froze on my husband rocking him to sleep. Now i mght be a little spoiled but I had my first baby monitor for 5 years and only traded it in because the camera didn't move. Figured I'd upgrade to this. A year later: panic and pandemonium. Thought it was a fluke but no. The monitor won't shuffle between cameras and still freezes. It worked great prior to this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safely keep an eye on your kids!
customer_reviews.text: This was unanimously recommended to me by my friends for its reliability and the fact that didn’t connect to WiFi, an important factor for me! We have been using it for two years now and it has been absolutely amazing. I’m that paranoid mom who wakes up to make sure my kid is breathing - this monitor provides a crisp picture to allow for this. Planning to add another camera now that we are pregnant with our second. The only thing I’d change is the battery life of the viewing unit. Ours has to be plugged in to work now. After 2 years, I kind of expected that, but still felt others should be aware.
customer_reviews.author: VoteForPablo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this monitor because it runs on WiFi and has excellent picture quality and sound. I love the easy to use features like toggling from one camera to the next (or using auto scan) makes it easy to see both kids. The reason I am writing this review is because of my recent experience with their customer service. I reached out to them to let them know my first monitor was behaving strangely after about 6 months and then died on us right after the warranty expired. They asked for the old monitor back and sent us a new one. They were understanding and extremely pleasant to talk with. One of the best kinds of customer service out there.
customer_reviews.author: RR sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I started noticing that the picture on our second Infant Optics camera that we purchased 8 months ago was very dark. It appeared fuzzy and dark and we could barely make out the silouette of our baby on the monitor. I contacted customer service and after trying to trouble shoot the problem, they sent me a new replacement camera which works amazingly and has great picture quality. We have an older one from a few years ago, and the new replacement camera has better picture quality than our original one, so it appears they have upgraded the camera. Very happy with the no hassle replacement!
customer_reviews.author: T. Ng

customer_reviews.title: New parent anxiety
customer_reviews.text: As a new parent I feel like you constantly want to keep an eagle eye on your little one. With this monitor I'm able to do that while also getting some ish done around the house.... Cause let's be honest, house work doesn't stop just because you have a baby right? Picture quality is great in high and low light, sound clarity is surprisingly good too. I also feel like that ptz (pan-tilt-zoom) feature is both helpful and simple to operate. I'm able to go all over our house and in the basement with a clear signal. Easy to use high quality monitor helps this new mom keep a constant anxious eye on our tiny tyrant :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Albe

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but horrible range!
customer_reviews.text: I am having an issue with the range. I live in a 6,000 sq foot house and the baby’s room is just down the hall. The range is awful. It keeps showing me out of range. I’ve placed the monitor all around my room and even left the bedroom door open and still no signal. Once I leave my bedroom the monitor works which doesn’t work for us. The camera itself is lovely but the range is awful. I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: JeniKay05

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Best monitor and even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor, its of great quality! I have been looking for a baby monitor that doesn't need to be connected to internet to function as I keep travelling with the baby and take it everywhere. After about a year my monitor screen fell and stopped working and I contacted the customer service at Info Optics and Kristine there was very helpful and prompt in responding to my queries and helped me with a replacement monitor screen and this time they sent me the latest version of it. Couldn't be happier with the product and the customer service. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rexs

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera and monitor. The only reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5, is because my camera suddenly malfunctioned after about 5 month of use, and was projecting almost a thermal image instead of a clear picture. However, their customer service was top notch and they quickly replaced it, under the warranty. I will gladly recommend and am happy to change my rating to 5 stars, once I’m sure that my replacement doesn’t have the same issues. I love being able to pan the camera, just where I need it. The image is good, and the signal range is pretty decent. Overall I’m quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon W.

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Quality at Best
customer_reviews.text: I'm definitely disappointed in the quality of the picture. We used to have a $70 Hello Baby monitor, and the quality on that one is about the same as this one's. I was hoping that for the price I would have an easier time seeing the video feed when it was set to night vision. Unfortunately, that is not the case and the quality is actually pretty poor compared to what it looks like in the demonstration video. The ability to turn the camera is nice, but other than that the camera has no other benefits over my Hello Baby monitor. For more than double the price and one less camera, this was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Derron G Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I used a Motorola monitor for my first child but the antenna broke. I bought this plus an extra camera before baby number two arrived. We’ve been using it for 9 months. I have no complaints about the audio or video quality. It works much better than the old Motorola. The battery life is phenomenal. My only complaint is that the blue light that indicates the battery is fully charged is bright as day! The power button quit working after 8 months. I emailed customer service and they responded the same day. Once they had the information they needed, they shipped me a brand new monitor for free! I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Best non-wifi camera on market
customer_reviews.text: The camera is easy to set up and expandable to multiple camera units. We switched to Infant Optics to get away from another brand that broadcast over wifi - Infant Optics communicates directly between the cameras and monitors. The range is good across our 4 bedroom two story house and even works when the monitor is outside on the back patio. This is a replacement for our original monitor (2015.a version) which lasted 2.5 years before it started to freeze and drop communication with the cameras. We are expecting our 3rd child and wanted to be able to add to the 2 cameras we already have in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: After 1.5 years use, it’s flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this baby monitor for a year and a half now. At first I was pretty impressed with it, but not so much now. The battery is basically worthless at this point and we have to keep it plugged in all of the time. The connection between the cord and monitor is loose, so if we don’t plug and push it in just right, the monitor doesn’t charge. The antenna has come loose and just wags around, we cannot get it to stay in. Basically it still functions, but it feels flimsy. I don’t think this monitor would last through another child, and for the price I would expect this to be a more solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen708

customer_reviews.title: Just bought, great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I've just bought this but I'm really excited to see how it lasts with all the great reviews. If you're looking to see more of the room, I recommend buying the wide lenses right off the bat. I have 2 kids in a room and the regular lenses just cover the one kid. I love the battery life so far, outlasts almost every monitor I've ever tried. I also love the moving feature, and the picture is fantastic. I even love the beeping alert when you're out if range even though I would have thought the range would be better, I'm still really impressed with this monitor and I've only had it one day so far!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Sound went soon after purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this March 7th, sound went within 2 weeks.. Initially we were very happy. However, the sound on it has basically gone. You can’t hear anything really. Someone can stand 6” from it and talk and it’s barely audible. The sound is turned all the way up, so I’m not certain what’s going on, as it has not been moved or even adjusted or anything since we bought it (it’s in one spot facing our toddler’s bed). The picture is still ok, just no sound.
customer_reviews.author: CandyJW RN

product_meta.title: Infant Optics DXR-8 Video Baby Monitor with Interchangeable Optical Lens
product_meta.description: The Infant Optics DXR-8 video baby monitor has a long track record as a monitor that you can trust. Its compact size strikes a perfect balance between performance and versatility, for being a small and light enough monitor to carry around the house, whilst offer stunning video and audio quality. If you are looking for a baby monitor with camera and audio, the DXR-8 is the trusty monitor that will provide you and your baby that peace of mind. The DXR-8 is a video baby monitor with camera lenses options. Swap between normal, zoom, and wide angle (sold separately) lens to suit your camera placement needs. Take zoom to the next level by using the zoom lens and digital zoom together.The DXR-8 baby monitor video and audio feed is transmitted via a secure internal 2.4GHz channel with FHSS technology. Unlike internet-enabled baby monitors, no information is shared or communicated through the internet on the DXR-8 video baby monitor, meaning your privacy of you and your baby will not be compromised. At Infant Optics, we are the baby monitor specialists where we never stop refining the firmware and software on existing baby monitor models like the DXR-8. We listen to our customers and incorporate changes to improve user experience. Our goal is to create the best baby monitor possible. ‘Top Pick’ by Business Insider on Aug 7, 2019. ‘4.5 stars’ by TechRadar on June 28, 2018. ‘Best Overall: Infant Optics DXR-8’ by Mashable on October 26, 2018. ‘Best Overall Baby Monitor 2018’ by Popular Mechanics on September 25, 2018.
feature_bullets: 2018 AWARD WINNER: Popular Mechanics Best Baby Monitor, 9/25/18
PERFECT SIZE & WEIGHT RATIO - no large batteries to power energy-hungry large screens. The DXR-8 is light-weight and portable, designed for true mobility around the house.

FULL VIEWING CONTROL - The DXR-8 is a baby monitor with camera features such as pan/tilt/zoom and interchangeable lens. Fit the zoom lens to see closer, or zoom out with the wide angle lens. Expandable up to 4 cameras

ROBUST AND MATURE HARDWARE - the DXR-8 is fine tuned and refined over years of iteration from feedback of real users. Trusted by over a million parents, our award winning monitor is backed by vigorous testing and quality control.
PRIVACY GUARANTEED - Video and audio is transmitted via a secure 2.4GHz channel with FHSS technology. This ensures no data is shared through the internet.
